reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress pretty and comfortable, particularly noting it's perfect for chilly days. They appreciate its fit, with one customer mentioning it falls just below the knees, and its soft fabric and flattering A-line shape. Moreover, the dress is versatile, working well both dressed up or down, and one customer notes it's great for fall with boots. However, the material thickness receives mixed feedback, wit

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars FLATTERING, CUTE & COMFORTABLE
items.body: This is a great dress. It is cute, comfortable and flattering for most figures. The fabric is soft like flannel and stretchy like a super soft t-shirt while keeping its shape. It fits true to size and has a lot of give so the busty or not so busty girls look great, and you can stretch your arms out without feeling constricted. I gave it a spin dancing and the skirt twirl is fun. The ribbing in the fabric makes it slimming and the softness makes it cozy, but not sweaty hot. This fabulous dress lends itself to holiday party glam jewelry, or casual activities. It is well made, doesn't wrinkle easily and will DEFINITELY be a new GO TO dress. Read more
items.author: Honest Angel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful fit!
items.body: I have 2 of these dresses in different colors. They are really soft. Very comfortable and flattering. I am 5â€™4 and 139lbs. This dress makes me look great! The quality is good for the price. The fabric is kind of stretchy. It doesnâ€™t cling except where it needs too! Great dress! Great look! I will buy more of them. Read more
items.author: Karen l Shelton

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty color and soft
items.body: This was a very pretty dress and fit nice but the material on the ends on it I wasnâ€™t sure about. Was it supposed to be there or not, it hung over the hem line. I de used to keep it cause itâ€™s comfortable and flattering, true to size but hopefully when I wear it that it doesnâ€™t look cheap. Read more
items.author: Sherry C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great holiday dress
items.body: Perfect holiday dress! I paired it with a silk scarf, gold sequined cardi, leather and wool swing coat, knee-high boots and tights. It was comfortable and a gorgeous deep red color. Material is a bit thin so layers worked well for my winter outing. Really a nice dress as the base layer for a holiday ensemble. Read more
items.author: MinxerDex

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect dressy-casual dress
items.body: Beautiful dress and great quality! The fabric is soft and stretchy. It runs big though, so size down. The dress is not sheer and it's also a great length! Definetly not too short. The dress does not shrink after washing either and the quality holds up. I highly recommend this dress for something dressy-casual. Read more
items.author: Cassie M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and warm. Exactly as shown in photo!
items.body: This dress is incredibly soft, stretchy and comfortable! I absolutely love the way it fits. The material is thin, yet somehow still very warm. You can dress it up with some heels or boots or wear it more casually with some sandals. The color is gorgeous, very Fall. The length is great, not too short but if I bended over to pick up my toddler, I definitely would've given someone a show, and the cut is very flattering as it hugs higher in the waist and then flares out, which my postpartum tummy appreciated. Read more
items.author: Whitney

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute style, but not very thick
items.body: It's a lot thinner than I would have liked. Its stretchy, soft, but not warm like a sweater which is what I was expecting. I ended up returning it just because I was hoping for a thicker material. Not great for fall in Maine. Oh, and it doesn't have pockets. :( Read more
items.author: RH

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Dress!
items.body: This ANRABESS Women Long Sleeve Ribbed Knit Sweater Dress is very pretty, and it's priced just right for me, so its value for the money is spot on. I ordered the purple version, and it matches the photo. The pockets are great, and I can slip my cellphone into it without it falling out. It's easy to put on and take off. The length is just right (I'm 5'1" and weigh 115 lbs), and it falls just below my knees. Its stretchiness is great and you can move around easily, but it retains its shape. The only downside for me is that the waist sits right across my middle tummy, and it makes me look pregnant, (I have a post menopausal tummy and a short torso) so, unfortunately, I had to return it. ðŸ˜« I highly recommend this sweater dress if you want a cute sweater dress!! Read more
items.author: OllieRoseMyHeart

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Deep Green, Blue, Burgundy, Rust Orange, Black, Deep Grey, Khaki, Pink, Beige, Purple, Cool Ash Brown, Dark Blue, Caramel. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
